title: Risi e bisi (rice and pea) ham salad
ingredients: ['340 g (12 oz) mixed basmati and wild rice', '600 ml (1 pint) boiling water', '150 g (5½ oz) frozen petit pois', '200 g (7 oz) piece lean cooked ham, trimmed of fat and cut into strips', '3 celery sticks, sliced', '1 red onion, thinly sliced', '3 tbsp chopped parsley', '2 tbsp chopped fresh mint', '1 head chicory, leaves separated', '100 g (3½ oz) radicchio, finely shredded', 'salt and pepper', 'Fresh orange dressing', '6 tbsp orange juice', '3 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '2 tsp Dijon mustard']
